jd: From: Malavika, Yochana malavika@yochana.com Reply to: malavika@yochana.com Hi,This is Malavika from Yochana IT Solutions, I Recently found your resume in one of our Job portal and We are looking for Lead Business Analyst (Onsite)”with one of our client, I have included the job information below, If you are interested, please share your updated resume.Role: Lead Business AnalystLocation: New York (Onsite) C2CMandatory : Capital market domain Financial Domain experience Skill SetOverall 10+ Experience5+ years of experience in Requirement Gathering and Elaboration session with the Financial CustomersHands on Experience in Engaging in customer discussion to understand the business requirementsExperience in Capital market domain- especially trading, listing of securities, regulatory aspects of capital market - like compliance and reporting can be added to the listActivitiesParticipate in requirement gathering and Process/User Journey design thinking workshops.Forecast and suggest the Future Roadmap and Functional scalability for RequirementManage functional product backlog and supports in maintaining functional designs.Creating, Managing User stories and validating development & test scenarios.Organize Show and tell sessions to business,Knowledge transfer to development and testing team. Thanks & Regards,Malavika,Resource Specialist,Yochana IT Solutions INC,Farmington Hills, MI,malavika@yochana.com
